import-json-screen.title: Import JSON from Masterplan
import-json-screen.label: Paste the Foundry JSON you exported from Masterplan below and click import
import-json-screen.create-in-encounter-folders: Import creatures into folders based on encounter
import-json-screen.no-duplicate-checking: Do not check if creatures already exist
import-json-screen.do-not-import-duplicates: Do not import creatures that already exist (globally)
import-json-screen.do-not-import-duplicates-in-folder: Do not import creatures that already exist in the same folder
import-json-screen.update-actors: In the case of finding a duplicate (if checking), update that monsters stats and powers (Will erase all existing powers and features)
import-json-screen.update-knowledge-button: After import, if you change the basic NPC data (name, type, origin) there is a context menu option in the actor list to update that in the 'Monster Knowledge' features

create-in-encounter-folders.Name: Default: Import into Folders?
create-in-encounter-folders.Hint: Default setting for when importing, should monsters be grouped together into a folder named for their encounter?

do-not-import-duplicates.Name: Default: Don't import monsters that exist?
do-not-import-duplicates.Hint: Default setting for if a monster already exists (in any folder), no not reimport it.

do-not-import-duplicates-in-folder.Name: Default: Only check duplicates in same folder?
do-not-import-duplicates-in-folder.Hint: Default setting for only checking within the encounter folder to see if a monster already exists.

bloodied-icon.Name: Auto Bloodied
bloodied-icon.Hint: Apply the Bloodied status icon automatically when a creature is bloodied.

dead-icon.Name: Auto Defeated
dead-icon.Hint: When a creature hits 0 HP it is given the dead status and marked as defeated in combat if an NPC, or dying if a PC. PC's are marked dead on -bloodied HP

bloodied-tint.Name: Auto Bloodied: Red Tint
bloodied-tint.Hint: Tint the token red automatically when a creature is bloodied.

change-dead-icon.Name: Change Dead Status Icon
change-dead-icon.Hint: Changes the Dead Status icon to be a red skull and crossbones which I found more obvious than the default

large-bloodied-icon.Name: Auto Bloodied Status will be Large
large-bloodied-icon.Hint: The bloodied status icon that is auto-applied will be a large central icon rather than a small standard effect

displayUnequipped.hint: Token Action Hud: Choose whether to display unequipped items on the HUD
displayUnequipped.name: TAH: Display Unequipped

abbreviateSkills.hint: Token Action Hud: Skills and Abilities use only their shortened name to save space
abbreviateSkills.name: TAH: Abbreviate Skills

hideUsedPowers.name: TAH: Hide used powers
hideUsedPowers.hint: Token Action Hud: Powers that have already been used are hidden

forcePowerColours.name: TAH: Colour powers by type
forcePowerColours.hint: Token Action Hud: Power buttons are coloured green/red/black/orange
